QuestData.Title: Mmm... Amberseeds!
QuestData.Description: Your stomach growls as the pungent smell of hearty nuts draws your attention to the bucket of seeds.$b$bSome thoughtful soul has obviously left these complimentary morsels here to rejuvenate weary visitors. Grateful, you take the remaining few and devour them.$b$bThe seeds do not disappoint. Finding yourself hungry for more, you set out to discover their origins....
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Master Woodsman Anderhol in Amberpine Lodge.
QuestData.RewardText: You did what!!!$b$bThose were Amberseeds! And that was an entire harvest's worth!$b$bThose magical seeds may have been the answer to our food crisis. Believe me when I tell you, $n, you're going to make this right!
